forgot-password.title: Forgot Your Password
forgot-password.text: Please enter the email address associated with your account, and we will send you an email link to reset your password.
forgot-password.email-sent: A link has been sent to the provided email address. Please open it and follow the steps indicated therein to reset your password

guest-user-description: This is a user who does not have a registered profile in the system but has submitted a request to participate in a campaign. This means that they have no control over this application.
registered-user-description: This is a user who is registered in the system. This grants them control over the campaign participation application and the possibility to cancel it if needed
